SELECT COUNT(ADBK_ID) FROM COMTNADBKMANAGE WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' AND (OTHBC_SCOPE = '회사' OR WRTER_ID = #{wrterId} OR (OTHBC_SCOPE = '부서' AND TRGET_ORGNZT_ID = #{trgetOrgnztId}) )
AND ADBK_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND OTHBC_SCOPE LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND WRTER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(USER_NM) FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%' ) + ( SELECT COUNT(CMPNY_NM) FROM COMTNENTRPRSMBER WHERE CMPNY_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%' ) + ( SELECT COUNT(MBER_NM) FROM COMTNGNRLMBER WHERE MBER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%' ) FROM DB_ROOT
SELECT COUNT(NM) FROM COMTNNCRD WHERE 1=1 AND NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
